Monday-Wendsday

Monday- we got up a 6:00 from my sister taking a shower and we got ready and then we hit the road and got some food and the car ride there was ok but we got lost a few times, got to the very nice hotel and got our room it was so nice. We found out its not six flags any more because Geauga Lake bought it and now thats what its called. To make matters worse there were no animals anymore. the first day was kinda crappy at first then we went to the wave pool and swallowed about 1 gallon of water lol and then we had dinner @ Ruby Tuesdays that was good, alot of laughes man i thought i was gonna die laughing. We went to the hotel and went to the pool and swam a little then we went to the arcade and that was really fun. We went back to the room and watched 50 first dates lol that was sooooo funny. Then went to bed.

Tuesday- we woke up and got ready then went to breakfast that was good and then we went to the park the first ride we rode was :Coyote Creek fudge . That was fun we got a picture on that and we rode it like 3 times!. then we went on this big red one called Thunderhawk that was fun we rode it 2ce only i wasnt gonna go on it the first time but taylor made me. We went on the Villian that was fun went on it 2ce. then we went on this little kiddie ride lol. We went on this big yellow ride called Dominator fun we rode it 2ce. We went on Bear White Water Rafting ride lol i got went first and taylor was laughing at me so there was a water fall and she got soaked under that HA HA!! but it was fun . Then we went on this bad ride that made me feel reallly unsafe its called head spin.Then we rode the x-flight wow that was so fun we rode it twice. then we went on the go carts. Went to the car and changed and then we went to the wave pool and we plaed games i got 3 things muchu..charles..mrs foot.. and then we went to another hotel it was crapy and we went out to dinner really nice place it was italian good place!! "were is your beer" Au-Ro-Ra"  "wheres au-ro-ra?" "In o-hi-o" me and taylor lmaoooooo!!!!!!!... then and the hotel we laughed tons lol my mom singing and the beer.. stop bandning against the head board megan!!!,... fun fun fun fun...
